channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump critic George Conway takes steps to run for New York City congressional seat
item.description: George Conway has filed paperwork to run for a congressional seat in New York City

item.title: 3 inmates captured in Florida after escape from jail near Atlanta
item.description: Authorities say three inmates who escaped from a county jail east of Atlanta have been recaptured

item.title: At least 5 killed after Mexican Navy plane on medical mission crashes in Texas
item.description: Officials say a small Mexican Navy plane transporting a young medical patient along with seven others has crashed near Galveston

item.title: US drops plan to deport Chinese national who exposed Xinjiang abuses, activists say
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security has dropped its plan to deport a Chinese national who entered the country illegally after his plight raised public...

item.title: US strikes another alleged drug-smuggling boat in eastern Pacific
item.description: The U.S. military says it has conducted another strike against a boat it said was smuggling drugs in the eastern Pacific Ocean, killing one person
